Code preview of 流程变量(上下文)历史表JBPM4_HIST_VAR

drop index IDX_HVAR_HTASK on JBPM4_HIST_VAR;

drop index IDX_HVAR_HPROCI on JBPM4_HIST_VAR;

drop table if exists JBPM4_HIST_VAR;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: JBPM4_HIST_VAR */
/*==============================================================*/
create table JBPM4_HIST_VAR
(
DBID_ bigint not null,
DBVERSION_ integer not null,
PROCINSTID_ varchar(255),
EXECUTIONID_ varchar(255),
VARNAME_ varchar(255),
VALUE_ varchar(255),
HPROCI_ bigint,
HTASK_ bigint,
INDEX FK_HVAR_HTASK (HTASK_),
primary key (DBID_)
)
type=InnoDB;

alter table JBPM4_HIST_VAR comment '流程变量(上下文)历史表
';

(

);
